reviewText: It was a great movie. To me it was a classic. Willie Nelson is a great actor and play a good part.
Have 4 of his movies. This is one of the best. It has a sequal also. Makes you wonder if his character was a lot like him.
I wish Mr. Cartwright would write another one. This series is not too violent or sexually explicit. For  saturday afternoon just perfect! 5*'s

I would like to get the aforementioned movie 'Pair of Aces' in DVD format.  I already have an old version on VHS and have just ordered another new copy on VHS but they all come write protected so I cannot copy them to DVD so that I might play them on my equipment.
Any chance of this movie being available in DVD format?
Fantastic movie. But there were jumpy spots in several sections. If not for those spots I would have given 5 stars
they need to put this on dvd

Loved the movie. I really enjoy seeing Willie and Kris work together. I have read that they are good friends and own property next door to each in Hawaii . They must really enjoy the time they spend together.

Thanks for the enjoyment they give their fans both with their films and music.

Sarah White
Willie and Kris I think always make a good movie.  Enough comedy and action to keep it as a fast paste movie.  Wish it were transferred to DVD.
The picture is fuzzy and there are flashes in it . It is better than what I had which is nothing

I gave this film 5 stars basically because it's obvious these dudes are having a great time and it was good to see them together as younger men all these years later.

On the other hand, I don't think one would expect the greatest of plot lines or acting, all things considered. It was just good fun from a nostalgic point of view.
everything was as stated.and it arrived by the specified time frame given,thanks and i will be buying from you again in the future.

I bought this movie to give to my husband for Christmas.  What's not to love, Willie Nelson and Chris Kristofferson, fun to watch :)  Just wish it was on DVD!  (thus the 4 stars instead of 5)  We transfered it onto a DVD, but .... that does not make the movie high def.  Still we had a good time watching it.
